title: eddy_combine
description: Combines diffusion data sets with opposite phase encoding directions for use with FSL's EDDY.

pos_data.title: Positive Data File
pos_data.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded data file (e.g. PosData.nii.gz)

pos_bvals.title: Positive B-values File
pos_bvals.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded b-values file (e.g. Posbvals)

pos_bvecs.title: Positive B-vectors File
pos_bvecs.description: Path to the positive phase-encoded b-vectors file (e.g. Posbvecs)

neg_data.title: Negative Data File
neg_data.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded data file (e.g. NegData.nii.gz)

neg_bvals.title: Negative B-values File
neg_bvals.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded b-values file (e.g. Negbvals)

neg_bvecs.title: Negative B-vectors File
neg_bvecs.description: Path to the negative phase-encoded b-vectors file (e.g. Negbvecs)

only_matched_flag.title: Only Matched Volumes Flag
only_matched_flag.description: Flag to include only matched volumes (set to 1 to include only matched volumes, otherwise 0)
